comment: Tell them that youre an unhinged member of The Rethithtance and that homeschooling is a better option for them. Numpty.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / tell-01

            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91

                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "The"
                                          :op2 "Rethithtance"))
                              :ARG2 (m2 / member))
                        :ARG1-of (u / unhing-00)
                        :domain (y2 / you))
                  :op2 (o2 / opt-01
                        :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                        :ARG1 (h2 / homeschool-01)
                        :ARG1-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (g / good-04
                                    :ARG1 o2
                                    :ARG2 t2)
                              :ARG3 (m3 / more))))
            :ARG2 t2)
      :snt2 (n2 / numpty))
